subject: feat: add sensitivity analysis and growth projections UI
body:
- Add ApexCharts integration for data visualization
- Create chart component library (BaseChart, TornadoChart, ScenarioChart,
  CashFlowChart, CumulativeCashFlowChart, NPVComparisonChart)
- Create analysis panels (SensitivityPanel, ProjectionsPanel,
  ProjectionMetrics)
- Add tabbed interface to calculator page (Results | Sensitivity |
  Projections)
- Update formatters with compact currency notation for charts
- Update documentation
